body_html:
hey @sareg0 cool, I started on this branch here https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/tree/add_application_form

in app/views/application_forms/new.html.slim is the form,
if you need to add a field you have to add it there and to app/models/application_form.rb where you also specify the validations on a field.

just ping me if you have questions (:
body_text:
hey @sareg0 cool, I started on this branch here https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/tree/add_application_form
in app/views/application_forms/new.html.slim is the form,

body:
hey @sareg0 cool, I started on this branch here https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/tree/add_application_form

in `app/views/application_forms/new.html.slim` is the form, 
if you need to add a field you have to add it there and to `app/models/application_form.rb` where you also specify the validations on a field.

just ping me if you have questions (:
